title: Ju Wenjun Strikes Back To Win Game 3
story_summary: GM Ju Wenjun defeated GM Tan Zhongyi in Game 3 of the 2025 FIDE Women's World Championship, leveling the score at 1.5-1.5.  Tan Zhongyi played a Sicilian, pressuring Ju who eventually grabbed a pawn.  Ju Wenjun won a 5.5-hour, 87-move game, despite a drawn opposite-colored bishop endgame. Game 4 is scheduled with Tan having white.

title: Niemann Withdraws Last Minute From Freestyle Chess In Paris
story_summary: GM Hans Niemann withdrew from the Paris Freestyle Chess Grand Slam for personal reasons, less than 48 hours before the event. This is the second replacement after GM Alireza Firouzja also dropped out.  GM Nodirbek Abdusattorov will replace Niemann. Organizers expressed disappointment but emphasized having strong anti-cheating measures. Niemann's withdrawal cancels another match with Magnus Carlsen.

title: Gurel Triumphs Over Erdogmus In Showdown Between Turkish Prodigies
story_summary: GM Ediz Gurel, 16, won his third Bullet Brawl title, defeating GM Yagiz Erdogmus, 13. The event featured high-octane chess over two hours. Gurel finished with a score of 222, fueled by a 23-game unbeaten streak. WCM Vesna Bogdanovic won the best women's prize. The next Bullet Brawl is scheduled for April 12.

title: Nakamura Easily Repeats In Freestyle Friday
story_summary: GM Hikaru Nakamura won his second Freestyle Friday in a row, finishing with 10 points. GM Sam Sevian finished second with 9.5 points, and GM Minh Le finished third. Nakamura's only loss was against Le. IM Karina Ambartsumova won her fourth women's prize in five weeks.

title: Magnus Vs. The World Hits 100,000 Participants, Breaks All-Time Record
story_summary: The Magnus vs. The World match launched on Chess.com, attracting 100,000 participants, breaking the record for the largest online chess match.  This Freestyle Chess match pits GM Magnus Carlsen against the Chess.com community.  A panel of coaches will provide strategic support to the World Team. The event surpasses the previous record held by Vishy vs. The World.
